title: Warriors Don't Cry: A Searing Memoir of the Battle to Integrate Little Rock's Central High
description: One of the nine black teenagers chosen to integrate Little Rock, Arkansas' Central High School in 1957 offers an account of her ordeal and of the 1987 "reunion" hosted by then-Governor Bill Clinton. 30,000 first printing. Tour.
author: Melba Pattillo Beals
